alert.note: Alert for Hansford (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued May 19 at 11:59PM CDT until May 20 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...The Flood Advisory continues for the following rivers in Texas... Palo Duro Creek at Spearman 6W affecting Hansford County. For the Palo Duro Creek...including Spearman 6W...elevated river levels are forecast. ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL TOMORROW EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Palo Duro Creek at Spearman 6W. * WHEN...Until tomorrow evening. * IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, Moderate overbank flooding occurs. Cattle are threatened and damage to fences is possible * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:30 PM CDT Friday the stage was 11.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 12.0 feet just after midnight tonight. - Action stage is 9.0 feet. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued Saturday afternoon at 1200 PM CDT.
